v5_2_news_main_array_item_1_title: Full support for right-to-left grid layouts.
v5_2_news_main_array_item_2_title: JustDo is now available in over 60 languages.
v5_2_news_main_array_item_2_subtitle: English, العربية, Español, Français, עברית, 日本語, ភាសាខ្មែរ, 한국어, Português de Portugal, Português do Brasil, Tiếng Việt, Русский, ייִדיש, Italiano, Deutsch, हिन्दी, Türkçe, Ελληνικά, Dansk, Suomi, Nederlands, Svenska, ไทย, Bahasa Indonesia, Polski, čeština, Magyar, Română, Slovenčina, Українська, Български, Hrvatski, Српски језик, slovenščina, Eesti, latviešu valoda, Lietuvių kalba, አማርኛ, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Kiswahili, Afrikaans, Azərbaycan dili, Беларуская мова, বাংলা, Bosanski, Català, Euskara, Lëtzebuergesch, македонски јазик, नेपाली, Norsk bokmål, Shqip, தமிழ், O‘zbekcha, Հայերեն, Қазақ тілі, кыргыз тили, Bahasa Melayu, тоҷикӣ.
v5_2_news_main_array_item_3_title: Introduction of a new style for the JustDo User Tooltip.
v5_2_news_main_array_item_3_subtitle: Displayed on hover over the User Avatar.
v5_2_news_main_array_item_4_title: Redesigned chat interface, both in the bottom windows and within the task pane.
v5_2_news_page_description: JustDo 5.2 is here with Right-to-Left (RTL) language support! Plus, we've added over 60 language options, a redesigned chat, and more. Manage projects globally with JustDo.
